snippet: Apart from the tracking polls, the only survey available as of our deadline on Saturday was one in Arizona, which had a surprising result, showing President Obama 2 points ahead among likely voters.
abstract: Apart from the tracking polls, the only survey available as of our deadline on Saturday was one in Arizona, which had a surprising result, showing President Obama 2 points ahead among likely voters.

headline.main: Oct. 13: Arizona and the Spanish-Speaking Vote
